tool.name: demo3D13
tool.help:
**Description**
demo3D13 exports images synthesized by demo3D01 as Wavefront files importable to Blender.
-----
**Input**
- A Directory of 3D Synthetic Images - Downsample Factor
-----
**Output**
- One zip file of six Wavefront (.obj) file containing the nuclear, cell shape, lysosomal, mitochondrial, nucleolar, and endosomal channels
-----
